website_summaries.verdict: Costs a little more than some others, but it'll give your wheels a high level of protection.
pros: Manufacturer is well known for providing paints that resist high temperatures, but this wheel paint also protects against other tough materials, like salt, sand abrasion, and brake dust
Will help the wheel surface avoid rust problems
Works well for all types of wheels
cons: Slightly smaller spray can size than others, so price per ounce is higher

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but was compelled after using this product. Not familiar with the brand but very impressed on how even it sprayed and covered. Sprayed a set of silver Land Rover wheels with three cans of color and one can of primer. Had about a half a can left over. Cleaned wheels with degreaser and lightly scuffed them. Lightly coat each wheel with VHT primer, two light coats of color and one final heavy coat to flow it all together. Now need new lugs nuts. Wheels turned out excellent for a half effort job. Best rattle can paint I ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: SUPER EASY
customer_reviews.text: I JUST SPRAYED OUT AND IT COMES OUT PROFESSIONALLY ITSELFS !!!! ALSO THIS IS MY FIRST TIME TO PAINT WHEELS! SUPER EASY
customer_reviews.author: Danny Kwak

customer_reviews.title: PREP WORK IS KEY
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely astounded by this product. I wanted to paint my rims black but didn’t wanna use plasti dip got sick of it. This stuff is worth every penny. Lays on real smooth didn’t run at all. I feel if anyone had a problem with this stuff it’s cause their prep work wasn’t right. I just used a scotch pad and make sure all the clear was off. No shine what so ever. Gonna get ceramic coated once the paint is fully cured. Great product well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Dembrosky

customer_reviews.title: Poor Manufacturing, Pathetic Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these. 2 of them arrived without spray nozzles, and only one can worked and clogged halfway through the can. So for $40 I was able to use a half a can of spray paint. Wow. After reading other reviews it sounds like this is a common problem with VHT. Absolutely pathetic that a company can send out a product through a trusted supplier like Amazon with such a garbage product. I can’t even return them either because I didn’t start my project within the 30 day return policy so I’m stuck with $40 worth of garbage. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great finish and durable!
customer_reviews.text: The spray nozzle is a bit finicky when the can is not full. To avoid over spray problems try as much as possible to keep the can vertical. Easier said than done when painting a wheel. The finish and durability of this paint cannot be matched. The best finish I have found with a rattle can. Always spray the most visible portion of the wheel last and if you can work fast enough to keep the entire surface wet you won’t have any over spray issues to deal with. Claying the portions with over spray after drying will fix most if not all of any imperfections you find. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Sprayed great, but has a green tint - watch out!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this VHT 186 Chevy Rally Silver to paint the rally wheels on my '69 C-10. I expected from the title that it would be the pure silver version of argent silver paint but this one seems to have a slight green tint. So watch out if you are looking for a pure argent silver. If you are trying to restore a late 60's Corvette that had the green tint in its argent silver rally wheels, go for it. Otherwise, be aware you may just get a little green in your silver with this paint.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Dabel

customer_reviews.title: Works well on more than wheels
customer_reviews.text: I had a few areas as big as 10" x 14" on my aluminum boat that needed to be painted. I needed a single stage black and this matched very well, it actually looked better than the original paint after using a 1500 grit paper then buffing it! It was sand-able after 2 days and has a very hard finish. Worked great for my project and I assume it would work very well on wheels as well. Tom
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schlomm

customer_reviews.title: looks OEM
customer_reviews.text: Kind of expensive, but the results are fantastic. I sand blasted then resprayed some old Chevy truck rally wheels for use on my trailer, and the results were better than expected. The trailer has been outside for about a year now and the wheels still look nice.
customer_reviews.author: sydneydanny

customer_reviews.title: This is great for making your wheels look shiny and new
customer_reviews.text: This is great for making your wheels look shiny and new! If you want a great way to get your wheels to look brand new, use this! It's easy to apply and dries fast and evenly coated. What I like about this product is that it cleanly coats the entire wheel in a nice clean coat without drip spots. After it dries, it looks real smooth and professional. My car looks even better now after I changed the wheel color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this over the DIP you wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: love it just a little more prep work that plasti dip but last wayyy longer. never dipping my wheels again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey H

customer_reviews.title: Great end result
customer_reviews.text: I submerged can (about up to cap) in hot water before using. Sprayed extremely well after good shake and following directions. Remember - prep before painting is essential for quality outcome. Used wire brush attachment on drill, air removed debris, degreased and then primed before painting.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: This paint is garbage. I wasted not only my money
customer_reviews.text: This paint is garbage. I wasted not only my money, but most importantly my time painting a set of motorcycle rims with this paint only to have it chip off at the lightest touch of a spoke when lacing. I used the paint, primer, and clear in order to ensure maximum thickness and adhesion. Buy a 2k paint to start and save yourself the headache.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Great paint
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for my 04 Chevy Express wheels. Easy and fast to spray and levels itself out quite nicely. A little goes a long way. There is enough to do 4+ wheels in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: a DIY Car Guy (youtube)

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great bought it multiple times you will have to put a good clear coat over it if using for rims otherwise it will just chip off also works great for rubber trim around windows and windshield did not have to clear coat that worked very good no problems chipping
customer_reviews.author: mike.trombetto

customer_reviews.title: deceptive. its a single can
customer_reviews.text: While the description says CASE OF 6 for $14, its $14 for a SINGLE CAN! BEWARE!!!!!! THAT PRICE IS CRAZY ITS $6 AT AUTOZONE!
customer_reviews.author: Jayson D

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Used this on my rims to fill the scratches from hitting the curb and so far after 3 weeks its been amazing. Since I just needed paint around the edges I sprayed the paint onto a plastic bag then painted it on with a foam paint brush
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good Paint
customer_reviews.text: VHT makes good paints and this is no exception to that rule. Motorcycle wheels are a bit of a beast to paint since both sides count and avoiding overspray is not easy. This paint will do the job if you put the rim in normal road orientation and spray your final coat on about 1/3 of the rim at a time working on both sides to ensure wetting out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. French

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match for alloy Chevy truck wheels or the inner portion of Sierra 18 inch wheels
customer_reviews.text: Have used VHT wheel paint before and it holds up well and looks good. Whereas the VHT Argent paint is a smooth finish, the Rally finish is metallic, just like the Chevy wheels and the inner portion of my 18 inch Sierra wheels. Because of the metallic rough finish you will want to clear coat them. I cleaned up the corrosion and than sanded everything with 220 sandpaper to give some bite. I also use NAPA self-etching primer on the bare metal. I didn't try to duplicate the original two-tone appearance, simply painted the whole wheel with the Rally and they look sharp.
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: Loved the look for this on my wheels
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look for this on my wheels! It went on perfectly and I did two coats just to make sure I got it all on.. after it sat for a few days I found that my whole car just looked better with this paint and I would do this again for the next car I get! only issue I found with this is that due to all the snow we've had in the past few days, the salt on the roads tore up some of the paint which really sucks. but it doesn't matter since it still looks great from this paint! I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: eby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for that flat color look, but with the protection a clear coat provides for your base!
customer_reviews.text: Love how this looked on my bronze Enkei wheels! A little with this stuff goes a long way. Two cans was more than enough for a set of 17" wheels. This clear is heat resistant wheel paint - the ONLY paint you should be using on your wheels! It protects the base more from dirt and chips than without a clear, but with the matte, it gives you a nice clear matte look as if it wasn't even there. I prefer this over a super high gloss look for wheels. Perfect paint!
customer_reviews.author: wdritchey

customer_reviews.title: Best quality
customer_reviews.text: Great wheel paint! A little more expensive then the other brands but you get what you pay for. I have used all the other brands and always had problems with flaking etc! With proper prep VHT wheel paint looks like a professional paint job 😊
customer_reviews.author: jane l g

customer_reviews.title: Good paint, good price.
customer_reviews.text: I painted my Jeep's wheels with it, and it's holding up really nicely so far. I did put a good scuff on the wheels and hit it with pre-paint, so my prep was decent but not great, and the paint looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Did not go well on my mini cooper wheels
customer_reviews.text: Used one can completely on each wheel of my mini cooper. Sits well but when I was fixing the wheel the wrench slightly touched the wheel and the paint came off. Looked delicate even after 4-5 coats.
customer_reviews.author: dnp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical at first BUT once I Egan spraying the wheels I was amazed, this is not ordinary spray paint, it is amazing. I bought more and am doing a second set of wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Shebang

customer_reviews.title: Requires specific experience
customer_reviews.text: Applied to sand blasted and primed steel rims. Found it difficult to get just the right amount for a fog coat and managed to produce runs despite my best efforts to avoid. I don't usually have this trouble with rattle cans so if you are not experienced with real auto painting, be very careful.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Laney

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Added a great finish to my freshly polished wheels. Easy application. (I did 4 wheels with 3 coats, with one can and still had extra. Image with center cap is after the paint.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Rader

customer_reviews.title: Awesome paint
customer_reviews.text: Great paint that comes out smooth and settles with minimal to no orange peel , I added a thick layer of 2k clear , PREP IS ALWAYS THE KEY
customer_reviews.author: forts619

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: bought this to paint an aluminum guitar amp chassis, and a year later the chassis looks exactly as the day I painted it. i only used 1 coat too. only problem Id say i have with this is that the spray is a tad too strong and focused. you need to stand a good 4ft away from the target or else youll get a permanent white line on your aluminum. not sure how this will look on smooth aluminum since I only used it for the chassis which was brushed aluminum. the chassis is now a tad whiter than it was before the paintjob.
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: So far im greatly satisfied with this it matched my satin black rims perfectly. Time will tell how it holds up , will update in the future
customer_reviews.author: Mr.brunson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent product so far from my experience. One bottle can be easily used for 6 tires.
customer_reviews.author: Santhosh

customer_reviews.title: Best u can get in a can
customer_reviews.text: VHT is the best. This stuff is quality. Gloss black looks great. It's all in the prep and application honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Worked good, nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Worked good, covered silver wheels well. followed the directions and let cure for 1 week as the label states.
customer_reviews.author: make it right the first time

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: As with any paint made by VHT, it sprays nice, and lays nice. Very easy to get good results with no runs.
customer_reviews.author: Racer X

customer_reviews.title: Wheels look like new again.
customer_reviews.text: My brother recommended the paint for my horse trailer wheels which started to show rust. I taped the tires using painters tape and then used an angle grinder, steel wool and tack cloth to remove the rust then primed and painted the wheels following the directions and the wheels on my horse trailer look like new again. Great product, easy clear directions and great results.
customer_reviews.author: enjoyeveryride

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing product. Doesn’t match the gray wheel cover and it goes on too thin to cover the bad spots on the wheels. In order to work right you would have to take the wheel off the car, mask everything and paint the entire wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Leon T.

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Great item, be careful how you angle the spray because you'll have to sand the paint down once it dries and do it all over again until you get the hang of it but overall it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: NIno Marcelin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Used 2 cans of primer and 3 cans of paint to do 4 wheels. You need to use a degreaser solution to clean your wheels first!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish
customer_reviews.text: Used on atv rims. Nice finish and have held up all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: They were easy to use. Used it for my Acura tlx
customer_reviews.author: Giz

customer_reviews.title: This is great, reliable quality paint
customer_reviews.text: This is great, reliable quality paint. As long as you use the right primer, this goes on evenly and looks like a professional finish. Got all my wheels done in a week (alternating with spare, one at a time).
customer_reviews.author: Keep Austin Beer'd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you use sandpaper all over rims and fully dry before spraying
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Wheel paint
customer_reviews.text: Worked well looked great on 1990 35 th anniversary Tbird SC with black wheels sanded them down took all the clear coat off cleaned wheels. Here I am 7 months later and its looks like it did before I painted then. now I have to sand them again and find a better clear coat.
customer_reviews.author: Robert THOMSON

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Used this with the VHT light gray primer. Covered well and looks great on mt 1997 Miata. Wheels look very good and close to the original brushed aluminum finish. One can of primer and paint was perfect amount for the 4 small wheels. Paint is holding up great after driving.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: The contain was very old like was made 10 years ago. But the paint is fresh and glossy.
customer_reviews.author: Rolex Reggie

customer_reviews.title: Buy local!!! Save 6 a can!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. But found out every day local store and places all over country sell it for 6 dollars less a can. Save money and shop local. Buying 6 cans adds up on the poor price, and lack of return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Austin DeRouchie

customer_reviews.title: changed the entire look of my car
customer_reviews.text: i like the way it ended looking but a few scratches tells me i should have put more coats on the wheels ( which i will do) other than that im quite happy with the paint
customer_reviews.author: clint moreau

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Did some painting on my side mirrors for a motorcycle. Very nice product sprays nice and even excellent coverage. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not Clear and can't be returned
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely not a clear coat. Compared to Wurth GL Clear Laquer Spray Pnt it is opaque and dull rather than clear and glossy. I ordered several cans to find this out and it can't be returned because it is classified as a hazardous material.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Wheels look like new. 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished the aluminum wheels on my 2003 f150 XLT. Followed the instructions. Wheels look like new. 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: C.C. Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great! Follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Do the prep work and sand! Remove oils and grease from surface of rim. End results are good if you do that
customer_reviews.author: JLandLB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality paint, prompt shipping
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this VHT color locally. I figured it would take a few weeks to get it in - with shipping paint. It arrived however within a few days. The product was as advertised and worked. Great VHT product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Paint for My $1000 Specialized S-Works Tarmac Carbon Bike Frame
customer_reviews.text: I repainted a $1000 carbon bicycle frame with this. Beautiful, durable finish. No clear coat needed. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: biketowork

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a final protective coat after I spray painted my Mustangs brake calipers. After about 6 months so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Neil D. Honschke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very close but not exact match for 2002 wrx center caps
customer_reviews.author: R to the D

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This clear coat works very well if you follow the coating time instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Laney

customer_reviews.title: Great for making wheels glossy
customer_reviews.text: Made my wheels look like a professional did it and I’m bad at spray painting lol worth it will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: very bad a few weeks and this is already coming out
customer_reviews.author: E. R.

customer_reviews.title: Great paint system for steel wheels
customer_reviews.text: Nice coverage and gloss....used the VHT primer and clear coat to finish the job. They did an excellent job resurrecting a set of black steel wheels on my truck. I can't comment on durability.....
customer_reviews.author: Steve Molnar

customer_reviews.title: Paint can't handle the heat
customer_reviews.text: Color is amazing but it drips and the paint wore off even though I followed all directions. Rims used to be blue
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected. It will take more time to see if product last. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Picasso

customer_reviews.title: Paint does not last long
customer_reviews.text: Spayed on a year ago and it already needs a new coat. Paint is not very good
customer_reviews.author: michael nunez

customer_reviews.title: They also have a clear coat that goes with this product that works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the factory color goes on perfect highly recommend does everything it's supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking wheel paint
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these cans of spray wheel paint for my truck. After thoroughly prepping the wheels with Scotch Brite pads, cleaning with acetone and self-etching primer I sprayed this paint on and they ended up looking great! It's been a month since I painted them and I see no sign of the paint flaking off or chipping. As with any paint, surface preparation is crucial!
customer_reviews.author: Aero Eng

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this paint
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a case of this and it's horrible, the paint came out really cakey wouldn't lay on flat on the rims
customer_reviews.author: Armando aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Polyurethane VHT wheel paint!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work with but don't use over light colors (white pearl) as it discolors to a dingy yellowish hue as it cures. Only use it with the other VHT brand wheel paints! There all dark colors. Also the "secret formula" is a polyurethane based paint which isn't found in any other spray paint! That's why it's so durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wulf

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: The product made tuching up the rims on the car easy they look a whole lot better than they did before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BRING THE GLIM BACK TO YOUR RIM.
customer_reviews.text: I like the Gloss & The Durability...I use as a touch up to my already powder coated M series rims ...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent wheel paint
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent wheel paint! Only one can was useable as the other can sprayer did not work. Not sure how to send back for a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: mmb

customer_reviews.title: Good Paint but bad nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Paint look good but can had a bad spray nozzle. Make for a of dripping. Will see if it is better on a second can.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Spurrier

customer_reviews.title: Finish Doesn’t Repliate Original Rally Wheel Finish
customer_reviews.text: Used to paint chevy rally wheels. Paint gave almost a speckle finish and does not replicate the original finish.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Sevila

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Take your time, follow directions and they will be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: true 5 star paint
customer_reviews.text: This paint is the best I have ever used I painted a set of alum wheels that were in very bad shape took the steps to prime and the paint and then clear all vht paint and now they look new worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: VHT A++
customer_reviews.text: Use this on aluminum gun parts .Holds up good if you bake on .
customer_reviews.author: Rustcrew

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, looks fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 cans for 4 wheels just the faces, covered nicely no runs, great paint. I recommend the primecoat and clear coat.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: That it’s the best
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and was delivered fast and on time. I recommend this product to any and everybody.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very good wheel paint
customer_reviews.text: Tough to make run..Sprays on great..I applied ,2 coats..Nice gloss..
customer_reviews.author: Drewski

customer_reviews.title: Wheels look great
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to apply and gave me an excellent finish
customer_reviews.author: Tracks13

customer_reviews.title: Headlight Spray
customer_reviews.text: Just used this product on my car and it sprayed very evenly with a nice touch! Highly recommend it. Had no running
customer_reviews.author: Shumael Choudhury

customer_reviews.title: Very good w/vht nite shade
customer_reviews.text: Used with vht niteshades. Worked very well. I did notice that you have to apply a thicker layer of the clear coat (compared to the nite shade) for the desired glossy look.
customer_reviews.author: F.K.D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It's just another can of paint but it works good and looks good
customer_reviews.author: Windsurfed

customer_reviews.title: Came out nice
customer_reviews.text: To save some money I bought VHT Chassiss bar paint and did 3 coats on the bar paint on my wheels, and then did 2 coats of the VHT Gloss black wheel paint at the end... Came out nice
customer_reviews.author: Questy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with finish, can do 4 rims with one can, but get 2 to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Great color and appears to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality thanks.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality thanks. i am ordering 2 more cans to finish my project :) Very good quality thanks. i am ordering 2 more cans to finish my project :)
customer_reviews.author: ottoman1014

customer_reviews.title: VHT Wheel Paint CLEAR
customer_reviews.text: I bought this paint to paint my rims on my car. I followed the direction according to the back of the can and the wheels came out great. I bought 2 cans of clear for four 17in wheels and that did 2 light coats and one wet coat. The clear made the wheels even glossier, which is what i was looking for. I feel that this paint is far supior to others. The easy spray nozzle is also great can causes less fatigue. I reccommend VHT wheel paint clear to all. Time will only tell how it holds up, i will write again in time and review more. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Chevyman2011

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the end result
customer_reviews.text: Used this to change the color on the after-market wheels on my vintage show car. Follwed the directions for careful preparation (thorough cleaning/scuffing of the original paint, then a few coats of self-etching primer) and the final product looked quite professional. Did not apply clear coat, as the car doesn't get much road abuse. Changed the color of the wheels from grey to black and I get lots of compliments. DON'T SKIMP on the preparation!
customer_reviews.author: Victor M.

customer_reviews.title: no nonsense, does a nice job for a spray can.
customer_reviews.text: It sprayed on just fine and was durable to touch overnight. It was tough to scratch and has an oem satin color, great for restorations. One of the more durable paints available.
customer_reviews.author: R&D

customer_reviews.title: Used this when I refinished my classic car trim.
customer_reviews.text: This is the same product that is sold by the local paint store but at a cheaper price. Works very good as a clear coating for car wheels and trim.
customer_reviews.author: Carpetbagger

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS LIKE I HAVE BRAND NEW RIMS
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about redoing my rims but, I have to admit after cleaning the rims (real good) and then giving them a very light sand the paint went on smoothly and dried rather quickly. I also used the clear coat over the top and these rims look beautiful makes my car look like a newer car. I am very happy with this product and if someone was thinking about redoing their rims instead of buying new ones this is the way to go. I only did these a month ago so long term I am not sure of but so far they look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: mickgirl2u

customer_reviews.title: Refinish wheels
customer_reviews.text: The product works but paint seems to dry befor it gets to the wheel so you need to use fine 400grit to get the smooth finish like the wheels had a originally.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky V. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wheel paint, matches original color, clear and go!! will use this vendor again
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: cool stuff
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done and brings out a shine, let's see if it really protects, do your worst Indiana weather!
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Worked good. I painted all my chrome bumper using the ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked good. I painted all my chrome bumper using the VHT primer and this. new application but seems to have worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Northcutt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product used on my truck wheels good so far
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: ordered clear to get free shipping, needed anyways.
customer_reviews.text: ordered clear to get free shipping, needed anyways. works great, quality clear, makes cleaning a lot easier, especially if you use brake dust barrier too.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: This paint is slightly darker than the color shown on the lid, but none the less it's good paint, and holds up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Loved the look for this on my wheels
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look for this on my wheels! It went on perfectly and I did two coats just to make sure I got it all on.. after it sat for a few days I found that my whole car just looked better with this paint and I would do this again for the next car I get! only issue I found with this is that due to all the snow we've had in the past few days, the salt on the roads tore up some of the paint which really sucks. but it doesn't matter since it still looks great from this paint! I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: eby

customer_reviews.title: Ripped Off
customer_reviews.text: it was suppose to be a 6 pack and I received 1 can
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased VHT sp148, sp183, and sp184 to paint the rims of my car flat black. I was a little bit hesitant because I didn't see as many reviews for VHT, which is why I'm writing this review- they came out great A couple hours and about 2 cans of each mentioned, and my rims came out just like I wanted. I have no experience with spray paint, but it was really easy to get a nice even shade. It's been about 2 months so far and I haven't noticed any chipping after all of the ice, mud, salt, and snow we've had. So, If you're thinking about painting your rims black I would definitely recommend the products I mentioned
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Love these clear coat
customer_reviews.text: Love these clear coat, I painted my wheels in high humidity and they still came out looking amazing. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Davis

product_meta.title: VHT SP187 Gloss Black Wheel Paint Can - 11 oz.
product_meta.description: Size:Single| Style:Coating| Color:Gloss BlackVHT SP187 Gloss Black High Heat Wheel Paint is a polyurethane paint specifically designed for steel and aluminum wheels. VHT wheel paint provides a great finish and real protection for all standard and custom wheels. Wheels take a beating both on and off the road from sand, salt, sun, brake dust and rocks which severely damage the appearance and protection of the wheel surface. This unique product resists chipping, cracking and fading, while protecting the wheel surface from oxidation. Careful preparation is essential to insure proper adhesion. VHT wheel paint is part of a multi high performance coating system. The coating system products consist of primer, paint, and clear coat. VHT wheel paint dries to the touch in 30 minutes and completely over night. Complete application and instructions are also printed on each can.
feature_bullets: Aluminum high heat wheel paint is a polyurethane paint specifically designed for steel and aluminum wheels
Best when used with primer color paint and clear coat process
Withstands temperatures up to 900 degrees when cured properly
This item is not for sale in Catalina Island
